name: Sunflower Code
description:
Note: This game has some amazing elements. It can also cause epileptic seizures in people with photosensitive epilepsy factors. When playing, please consult and play at your own discretion.

"Sunflower Code" is a first-person perspective mystery-solving horror that uses more than 50 Van Gogh paintings. You will be asked to break the code. Please derive the answer from various perspectives. If you can't find the answer, the hint is always down.

・ Story
Wright, the hero whose sister was taken away by the shadow. I don't know where I am to look for.
A letter is delivered to such a light by someone.
"I know my sister's whereabouts"

・ Stage-kan
A mansion that was once said to have been inhabited by people. Now there are no signs of people anymore, only black shadows now live.


·Shadow
A shadow that covers a mysterious surface. Shadows are vulnerable to light.

・ Encryption
The hint is always down.
